Class Baba

  • java.lang.Object
    • classesprincipais.Baba
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Servico

    public class Baba
extends java.lang.Object
implements Servico
    Classe que representa os servicos efetuados por babas.
    Author:
    Jeferson Rolim Holanda

    • Constructor Summary
